sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { singleProduct } from '../store/actions/products' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' export default function SingleProduct() { const product = useSelector((state) => state.products.singleProduct) const dispatch = useDispatch() return ( <>
Brand: {product.title}

Description: {product.description}

Price: {product.price + '$'}

Quantity: {product.quantity}

) }
